body:
* Update to Gradle v7. Thanks @gmodzelewski 
* Optional details in request duration metrics that can be enabled via an env var (`URI_METRICS_ENABLED`). Thanks @CathalOConnorRH

* Allow to customize the metrics job name via an env var. See #102 , thanks @guerricm 
* New metric: total responses per resource. See #103 , thanks @xinau
* adjust log level for some message that made debugging difficult otherwise
* add resource type to latency metrics. Thanks @slaskawi

* new metric added: `keycloak_login_attempts`. Thanks @xinau 
* the value of the instance label can be overridden when using the push gateway. Thanks @saparicio
* bump keycloak version. Thanks @CathalOConnorRH

* update prometheus client version to 0.9.0. Thanks @klinux 
* many new metrics related to client logins, tokens and more. Thanks @tlereste

* don't track routes in request_duration metric to avoid creating an excessive amount of data (#64 , #65 )
* support Prometheus PushGateway (#56 ). Thanks @SoerenSilkjaer
* fixes #52 (NPE when metric labels are null)

* https://github.com/aerogear/keycloak-metrics-spi/pull/40 (keycloak_request_duration metric updated to measure only specific response content types)
* https://github.com/aerogear/keycloak-metrics-spi/pull/42 (keycloak_request_duration metric histogram buckets updated)
* https://github.com/aerogear/keycloak-metrics-spi/pull/35 (new metric `keycloak_registrations_errors` and new label `client_id` on some metrics)

* https://github.com/aerogear/keycloak-metrics-spi/pull/30 (Additional Metrics)
* https://github.com/aerogear/keycloak-metrics-spi/pull/29 (Make Keycloak and Prometheus versions be configurable, thanks @saibot94)
